TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit STGMEDIUM extends System.ValueType

summary.span: Proporciona un identificador de memoria global generalizado con el fin de utilizarlo para operaciones de transferencia de datos.

span.span: Provides a generalized global memory handle to use for data transfer operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Para obtener más información sobre la programación con la estructura STGMEDIUM y Microsoft Management Console (MMC), vea el [Guía del programador de MMC](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).For more information about programming with the STGMEDIUM structure and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).
